bio.paragraph1: Iâ€™m a software engineer with a bit of interest in data science. I have over 2 years of experience in web development specializing in modern JavaScript, Typescript, Next.js, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js, Ruby on Rails, and many other tools and technologies.
